Articles.Content:
The tutorial asks me to “right click” or “right mouse drag” a part. Or any number of other commands which seem to be assuming the user has a Windows-based machine.
 

Could someone who plays on a Mac (or is familiar with the OS) provide some wisdom for this? 

Is there a MacOS keyboard command reference? 

 

Edited September 19, 2022 by Arkifornian

You could try CTRL + CLICK, or do a 2 finger click (on trackpad).

There may be some other gestures on trackpad, but honestly I don't use Apple devices.

https://www.tomsguide.com/how-to/how-to-right-click-on-mac
